title: France panorama. [No. 70/21]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. 28th Grand Prix at Monaco won by Jochen Rindt (Austria) beating Jack Brabham (Australia). 2. Filmed performace extracts of gymnasts from the Republican Guard. 3. Indian students present a folk loric show. 4. Examination of the techniques used by the Central Hydraulic Laboratory when researching harbours. 5. Two art exhibitions - Delacroix in Paris and Picasso in Avignon (all his paintings of his 88th year).
